name: Duck Kings Do Weird Things
description:
"Anates amo!" - Socrates

"Qu'est-ce qu'un jeu vidéo ?" - Diogenes

"对不起，但是什么." - Aristotle

That's right, baby! This is THE duck game, with the exceptions of Plastic Placid Duck Simulator, Duck Hunt, Ducktales, Darkwing Duck, and many others that I don't know about or just forgot to mention.

WASD/ARROW KEYS to move

Z to Undo

R to Restart

Space to Start Game

Good luck. Don't die.
